content: But I think the challenges of car may look more like home and pet in terms of our ability to launch a new product experience, a period of time where we have less data and we're -- we've shown a track record of being able to optimize fairly quickly, if you look at the track record of pet over the last 2 years of home over the last 3 years, there's been a consistent result, challenging early periods, consistent optimization and now heading toward what ultimately is our target LTV and target loss ratios.
